original_title: Within the Shadowz of Belize: A Green Day Arises
overview: The documentary leads into the unknown and hard reality of people in Belize. Some more than 30 years after independence the British ex-colony is looking for their identity through the art of film. The green trail, the optimization of the green economy is one of the ways of freedom.
title: Within the Shadowz of Belize: A Green Day Arises
